c:attribute.name: occupied
c:attribute.description: Estimate as to whether the home is occupied

c:attribute.name: peopleAtHome
c:attribute.description: Set of the addresses of people who are in this place

c:attribute.name: peopleAway
c:attribute.description: Set of address of people that are away from this place

c:attribute.name: devicesAtHome
c:attribute.description: Set of addresses of presence capable devices not associated with people in this place

c:attribute.name: devicesAway
c:attribute.description: Set of addresses of presence capable devices not associated with people that are away from this place

c:attribute.name: allDevices
c:attribute.description: Set of addresses of all presence capable devices

c:method.name: GetPresenceAnalysis
c:method.description: Presence analysis describes, for each person, whether the subsystem thinks the person is at home or not and how it came to that conclusion.

c:event.name: Arrived
c:event.description: Sent when a person or device becomes present.

c:parameter.name: type
c:parameter.description: The target type of this presence event. Namespace of addressable entity.

c:parameter.name: target
c:parameter.description: The address of the person or device presence event.

c:parameter.name: device
c:parameter.description: The address of the device currently associated with this presence event.
